About

My interest for progamming started at a young age, when I started experimenting with an old Development Environment called Turbo C, mainly curious about how computer programs work. As the time went by, my interest switched for the development of web sites and web apps.

I consider myself a creative and detail-oriented person who is willing to continuously learn those technologies that are necessary for the development and achievement of a determined project.
